title: When is Ekko Going on sale?
body: I honestly cannot wait for Ekko to go on sale i really want him and i right now have enough riot points for him.

replies.body: We don't have any specific dates to offer beyond what's provided in the [May Sales Schedule](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/may-sales-schedule).  It could come up an any time, so be sure to bookmark the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay up to date.  Hopefully our time warper can speed that up to sooner than later.  :P
